item.title: ダウンロード
item.dc:creator: SynthTAROU
item.description: Releases · syntaro/javamidimixerJava based MIDI-Mixer / VST Hosting. Contribute to syntaro/javamidimixer devel […]
item.content:encoded:
Releases · syntaro/javamidimixer
Java based MIDI-Mixer / VST Hosting. Contribute to syntaro/javamidimixer development by creating an account on GitHub.
github.com

Released.

V0.54 progress dialog
V0.52 Beta published fixed 10~ bugs
V0.51 Alpha renew UI 'Mixer' is now 'Surface17' and 'CCMapping'

V0.47 sysex bugfix
V0.43 Pair CC (+32) support again
V0.42b Java Synth Will Ingore GMReset Signal
V0.42 SysEX Bugfix
V0.4 Phraase Recorder, UWPx3 Bug Fix
V0.3+a8 Tuned RangeConverter
V0.3 Apache2.0 + GNU GPL3 Dual License

V0.16 beta fixed mixer component
V0.15 Visitant Architecture, Dataentry Input
V0.14 MouseWheel, ControllerSize
V0.13 Sequencer RealTime Tuning
V0.12 Template for CC Picker
V0.11 (Pre) Support DATAENTRY / 14bit
V0.10 Support 14 bit CC
V0.09 More Humanic Interface
V0.08 Drum Pad + Sequence + Chord
V0.07 Drum Pad + 0.1
V0.06 CC Mixer Chain
V0.05 supported Drum Pad
V0.04B supported SysEX Checksum


If you need UWP support Try load MXLIB01.dll or remove it.
If you need VSTi support, Try load MXLIB02.dll. or remove it.
